types.name: red
types.description: A Demolition product comprised Strontium Salts, Strontium Nitrate, Strontium Carbonate, Strontium Sulfate, Strontium Chloride

types.name: Orange
types.description: A Demolition product comprised of Calcium Salts, Calcium Carbonate, Calcium Chloride, Calcium Sulfate

types.name: Yellow
types.description: A Demolition product comprised Sodium Salts, Sodium Bicarbonate, Sodium Nitrate, Sodium Chloride

types.name: Green
types.description: A Recreational product comprised Barium Salts, Barium Nitrate, Barium Carbonate, Barium Chloride, Barium Chlorate

types.name: Blue
types.description: A Recreational product comprised Copper Salts, Copper Chloride, Copper Carbonate, Carbon Oxides

types.name: Purple
types.description: A Recreational product comprised A special mix of copper and strontium compounds!
